Articles.Content:
When ever I use the humongous parts in B9 I always get this. Here is a look at my craft.

On the runway, it stays. But the back wobbles.

But at launch... What the hell!?

Yeah. Anyone help?
Yeah, theres currently a bug with all of the HX parts where they'll be like that. :/ It's due to a problem with the Virgin Kalactic plugin and I have absolutely no idea when that'll be fixed.

Yeah, theres currently a bug with all of the HX parts where they'll be like that. :/ It's due to a problem with the Virgin Kalactic plugin and I have absolutely no idea when that'll be fixed.

Ohhh, ok then. :/
Moving this over to General Add On affairs, the place for mod-related questions.
